website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for something with contemporary style, try this chic upholstered design.
pros: Faux leather with button-accented diamond pattern
Metal center and side rails for support
Comes in several colors and sizes
cons: Some report that the wooden slats fail over time

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm.... Nope
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, the headboard broke away from the frame day one. UPDATE---- Bed frame fell apart exactly 2 days post return period. Now I am stuck with a fake leather pile of non working junk. I see no place for contacting to see if I can return or refund or what have you, so the review is all I have. I would not, and will not recommend this product, or the seller to anyone based on this experience. Thanks for the broken furniture? ZERO STARS
customer_reviews.author: D. M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and daughter loves it. Exactly as pictured. The only thing we did different is substitute the tiny boards that support mattress with plywood instead
customer_reviews.author: April R.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Wood Breaks
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS BED FRAME! I know it's cute and cheap, but not worth it. We've had this frame for less than a few months and it's broken. The wood underneath can't hold any weight. My mattress is fairly light and I'm 5'5'' 135 Ib.... Went to sit on it one day and it just broke and my mattress dropped through. Save your money and find a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I was reluctant. I am laying on my bed of now 6 months with no problems whatsoever. I love my bed sooo much. I am 32 years old 172 lbs. My mother yes my mother lol helped me put this together. I will say that we used power tools...a drill electic to screw the screws. This bed is unbelievably sturdy IM IN LOVE GUYS THANKS SO MUCH FYI don't use the package tools i mean can't really screw the screws in tight in sturdy with that alone.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Simpson

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last a month. The center supports completely snapped off just from two average sized adults sleeping in it. Definitely would NOT buy again and had I saved the box it would be going back but putting it together was such a hassle I'm not going through it again.
customer_reviews.author: MrsJones6690

customer_reviews.title: Looks good! My boyfriend put it together
customer_reviews.text: Looks good! My boyfriend put it together, there's no way I could've done it myself. I'm happy with it so far, seems to be good condition
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Then I put everything together and it looks good. The box springs are hidden by the padded ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the comments on how the slats break, I modified my bed right out of the box. I built the bed frame to support my mattress and box springs. Then I put everything together and it looks good. The box springs are hidden by the padded side panels. The bed sits pretty low to the ground, so my next project is to raise it a little.
customer_reviews.author: Cris B.

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!! Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Be aware!! This bed contains a chemical called formaldehyde!! that cause cancer. I didn't found out about this until I was putting the pieces together because the label is located in one of the panels. They should include this information on the product details!! Very disappointed 😤 picture included
customer_reviews.author: dania

customer_reviews.title: very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 13 year old son. we got this yesterday and spent about 30 minutes as a family putting it together. I will say, I was a little sketched out about the quality while putting this together but it is really well designed and by the time it is fully assembled, it is very sturdy and great quality. It also looks very nice. I love that I ordered a bed on amazon and didn't have to go bed shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Ferg

customer_reviews.title: Not at all worth it. Won't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, While it looks great post assembly, a few assembly steps are quite difficult. My queen mattress doesn't fit perfectly, leaving an inch of space at all edges... More importantly, the mattress doesn't get enough support so even when you sit or while sleeping when you turn around the bed literally moves along with you. There is no firmness plus It shakes everytime and make you feel so uncomfortable. Secondly, there is a zero response from the company. Horrible customer service. I'm not at all happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zoya

customer_reviews.title: Completely broke less than 1 month after purchasing.. ...
customer_reviews.text: Completely broke less than 1 month after purchasing... Just from sleeping. Heads up: It costs more to return this item than the actual item costs....
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Blakesley

customer_reviews.title: Great company response.
customer_reviews.text: Frame was easy to build by following the pictured instructions, a power tool helped instead of using the manual tool that came with the product. The downside is, there are plastic clips which hold the wooden slants to the bedframe, which once they're in, the plastic can not be removed without braking the clips. I installed all the clips backwards, thus needed a whole new set of clips. I followed the replacement instructions on their website and received new clips within 4 days. Amazing company response. Once properly assem led you'll have a nice bed with 4 extra large drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Dannydan

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I was very weary about buying this product because of all the reviews. I thought I wouldn't like it at all! It is very low to the ground so I did use my box spring plus my mattress and I love the height on it! I put it together by myself only took about 45 mins if even that! It's very sturdy and beautiful. The faux leather is very soft and everything came without any damage. I would recommend this product to anyone, best product I've bought on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WAIT A LITTLE WHILE BEFORE POSTING YOUR REVIEW ON THIS BED FRAME!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this bed. Do NOT be deceived by how pretty the bed looks, it really isn't worth the money or the hassle of putting it together. I've had it for 4 months and it has completely fallen apart and will not stay together no matter how many times we've tried to repair it. The hardware is cheap and no good. I am utterly disappointed. Honestly, I want my money back for this bed. They made it look good but it's just $200 worth of junk and in this day and age where many people are struggling just to make ends meet this is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Reed

customer_reviews.title: I loved the way it looks
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way it looks. Feels pretty sturdy, considering it was so inexpensive. We'll have to wait and see. The headboard is pretty low, but it will do. No box spring needed, placed mattress 12"high right on top. It took about 1.5 hours to put together.
customer_reviews.author: VM14

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at the Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical at first because some people said that the support slabs were breaking, but I've had the bed for over a month and haven't had any issues yet. For $300 this bed is pretty durable and the quality is nice for the price. The drawers aren't attached to the bed itself because they just roll independently on wheels but you can still lock them onto the bed when they're closed, plus they have a ton of storage space. Definitely consider this bed if you're looking for low-priced options.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: I put it together myself
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bed frame. I put this bed together by myself. I thought I would start and grab the men when I needed help. I just kept going page after page, it really was easy. I did take my time so I could not tell you how long it took, but not that long. I only needed help getting the frame on 8 bed raisers and the mattress on. It does sit low to the floor and I really need the under the bed storage and having 8 "legs" I needed 8 of them. It is a very nice look bed, I am very happy with it and I think the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: sj

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy bed
customer_reviews.text: This was very straightforward to put together and it feels very sturdy. The quality is nice. My mattress is a little smaller than the frame so there are small gaps in the corners. The drawers have plenty of room, although you can't pull out the ones near the head of the bed if you have a nightstand unless you move the nightstand, obviously.. I got this bed so my cat couldn't hide underneath and it has worked perfectly for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Phoquess

customer_reviews.title: For one it took me a good day to put it all together
customer_reviews.text: This is the flimsiest bed frame I have ever slept on. For one it took me a good day to put it all together, and even after following the directions word by word this frame moves all around. Certain parts wouldn't fit properly but I eventually made it work. The wood parts pop out of place almost every day because it's not strong enough or reinforced. They're only being held in by plastic pieces which the wood is barely long enough to get into these plastic pieces. If it wasn't for the fact of how painful it would be to take it apart and send it back I would have returned this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: beth murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping on this for months with an 8" memory foam mattress and just put it through its first stress test last night (don't mock me). It held up fine. I bought it so that my older dog has an easier time jumping up onto it. I wouldn't suggest moving it around too much once it's assembled, and be careful dragging it across carpet. Do not plan on storing items under your bed unless you intend to lift your bed up to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bed with headboard and frame!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these beds and they turned out so nice. Pleasantly surprised and happy so far. We used only mattresses with no box spring and it works great. I like that there is no space under the beds for messes or dust bunnies to gather.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bed for a kid
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bed for a kid! It's low to the ground and isn't overbearing or huge. It doesn't seem like the most high quality vinyl, but can't beat the price for a nice looking platform bed. We were missing some parts to assemble the bed, and it took about 12 days to receive the replacement parts. It was definitely frustrating to have a half made bed for so long. The costumer service was okay, but I felt the ordering process was a little dramatic to get a couple extra brackets sent to my home. The slow delivery and reordering process is why I subtracted a star. Overall, I would recommend for a child, but probably not ideal for an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: It is adorable and looks great in her room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my daughter. It is adorable and looks great in her room. I'm satisfied with the quality of this for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: I'm never leaving my bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Although it was the cheapest bed frame I could find in this style, the quality is great. I would highly recommend this bed frame to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Stiles Winchester

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: I love it . Very nice bed, color. Easy to assemble. Can hold close to 200 hundred pounds . We have 2 . After using 3 years our queen bed we bought twin size for the baby. Also great that you don’t need spring mattress box. The planks very strong to hold the mattress. The best thing that planks goes from two sides and in the middle has metal part. The planks don’t go through the width of the bed. Will recommend for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: viktoriya biletska

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Twin bed for my 2 year old daughter and it is so cute! The “leather” material is really great quality for the price! Love the height of the bed as I was nervous it was going to be too high for my daughter to get into, but it is the perfect height for her! The only thing I wish, was that the bottom inside of the drawers were a little better sturdy quality. They are just a harder plastic piece that goes in there so you definitely can’t put a lot in the drawer for the weight factor. Overall I would recommend this bed for a good starter toddler bed for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: After 36 years, we wanted a new bed. We chose this bed specifically because of the center support. It's perfect for our new memory foam mattress. Our son and my husband assembled it in 2 hours. All parts arrived intact.The roomy drawers keep all of my medical equipment out of sight and free of dust. We haven't even used all of the drawers, yet.
customer_reviews.author: KatherineL

customer_reviews.title: Broken slays everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I’m very torn about this bed. The headboard and padded sideboards are very nice looking and have held up well. The wood planks are another story. After about 8 months of very normal use they started snapping when an adult would sit on the edge of the bed. We weren’t even doing anything crazy. If you’re willing to piece it back together then it’s okay for the price. Also, be prepared that it is very low to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought, sturdy and comfy
customer_reviews.text: We ended up with this bed frame because all the wood frames are out of stock and no local furniture stores are open. I thought we would hate it but actually we really like it. The materials are fake leather fabric that is soft and seems in perfect condition. The supports are wood and steel. I put it together myself. It took a methodical approach, plenty of floor space, and about two hours. No problems with it and it went together very sturdy. It fits the mattress great and is very cozy to sit against. It looks great in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picture is a bit deceiving
customer_reviews.text: First, this is for my 12 year old. She actually followed the instructions and put it together herself! It's nice and she likes it. I'm a bit disappointed that after putting on a 12 inch mattress the headboard is almost nonexistent! If she did not spend so much time assembling it I would have sent it back because of the VERY SHORT headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne B.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed that the bottom of the drawers are not words but plastic. However, my husband said with the metal framing they seemed pretty sturdy and he really felt like the bed was a good purchase. The drawers are very big and roomy. Also the drawers don’t actually slide on a track, they roll under the bed with wheels and then you canand latch them to the bed.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lower

customer_reviews.title: Lots of small pieces but we'll made
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of pieces to this bed, I was shocked. I watched a video where someone said it took 30 minutes to set up, that how long it took me to get all the pieces out of the box and line them up on the floor. In total it took over 3 hours by myself... Note, I was in no rush. Wish I could send it back and go to the store and pick one up but for a single bed this thing is heavier than my queen bed made of natural wood. The thing is when all is done it is a beautiful and very sturdy, well made bed, just wish they had done some of the work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small by 3-4 inches!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bed! The material is just awesome and it is really sturdy. I'm giving it three stars only because of its size. Once you assemble them you realize they run small. My mattress is now bigger than my bed by 3-4 inches. Initially I thought my mattress is big but then I looked up the size of a queen mattress and then measured the bed and to my disappointment the bed is small! I decided to live with it as I was too lazy to disassemble and repack and return it! Also it's really big and heavy so it's not easy to return as it won't fit in your car!
customer_reviews.author: Rajath

customer_reviews.title: BUT it is perfect. It is pretty and it is solid
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 star but my boys did have trouble putting together. It was a two day process and there is now an agreement on my fridge that they never have to put another thing together for me! BUT it is perfect. It is pretty and it is solid. Was afraid of a squeaky wobbly bed and I am 250 pounds and it is perfect!! I got a memory foam mattress without the boxspring and it is the perfect height. I would 100% recommend this bed just have patients and the right tools to do the job
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: White/King size with storage drawers
customer_reviews.text: The bed is hard to assemble, it requires 2 people and a lot of patience especially when it comes to putting together the storage drawers. The bed (the construction itself) IS fragile (the faux leather seems very delicate too), and after reading the reviews I was very scared it would break on the first day however it has been holding up well for 9 months already, and well, we are not elephants and we don't jump on it. So far so good, I am satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but for a college student I guess would be ok
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but cannot sit at the end of the bed or it will break (the slots underneath will fall out of place) and you will fall inside the bed onto the floor. Bed looks nice but like I said, don’t ever sit on any of the corners or you will be forced to take the mattress off everytime and fix the slots again. Make sure to also tell everyone that comes to your house not to sit on the edge or corners of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Haro

customer_reviews.title: We love this twin bed
customer_reviews.text: Very nice twin bed. I was able to put it together myself (with a little help from my daughter). I was initially worried about the way the slats were designed, however once it was assembled I felt it was very sturdy. The storage drawers underneath give plenty of storage space while looking nice and tidy. My daughter absolutely loves her new bed, even our dog approves. 😁 Overall I am very happy with this purchase and would definitely recommend this bed to others.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The frame is easy to assemble. the instructions call for 2 people, but it can easily be done by one person. The frame looks great; i only wish the headboard was larger/higher. My frame (white) came with a couple of small stains, but nothing major. the 4 drawers are large, but not very study. they also take up the entire length of the frame which isn't really smart since almost everyone has night stands and can hence not access the top drawers.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed....Tedious to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9yr old daughter. I'm happy with the results, strong bed frame but definitely not for jumping on. I'm very handy, it took over 2 hours to put together, instructions are a little bit vague but I kept looking at the pictures and followed the letters marked on the pieces and compared them to the photo's. You MUST decide which side the drawers will go on, bf you assembly, you can change your mind but it's more work to change. This in not cheaply made, but it's not for adults. You dont use a box spring, mattress sits on the wood slats (fairly strong).
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Comes damaged
customer_reviews.text: This bed looks beautiful. But the shipping is horrible, and the material is extremely sensitive. I bought four of these beds. All came in ripped boxes damaged in shipping. And the material on 3 of the 4 headboards was noticeably ripped. I don't know whose fault it is, but definitely not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sammy

customer_reviews.title: it looks great and was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This bed is totally worth the money...it looks great and was easy to put together. We used the mattress and boxspring from the old bed and it's perfect! Thanks to those who said the wood slats aren't that sturdy - placing the boxspring on top of them makes for a worry free bed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna P.

customer_reviews.title: Scratches too easy
customer_reviews.text: The bed seems to be made with a very cheap and non scratch resistant faux leather, it will scratch if you look at it too hard. The bed it pretty sturdy, it seems to be made to last about a year or two tops, the drawers are mounted on wheels and hook up to the frame via a large screw you hook them up to. I bought it for my kid si I will just let it be and see what it delivers, I am not very happy and will not be buying from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great product with impeccable packaging and instructions
customer_reviews.text: Just put this bed together using only hand tools. This bed looks elegant and let me tell you, the assembly instructions read like a dream! And the packaging was very organized, professional and even thoughtful. I bought a whole bedroom set on Amazon from different vendors and this one is hands down the best one for its appearance, its packaging and assembly. I have not had it long enough to rave for its quality but by the look of it, it stands out from the other pieces in the room. I highly recommend this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short headboard
customer_reviews.text: The headboard is short; simply putting pillows vertically will cover it. If I sit and lean My head to the back, I will touch the wall. I wish the headside board was a little higher so that the design shows when I made the bed. The drawers are plastic from the inside so I can't store thick blankets or towels, only light items. The base is cool though coz it's fixed to the frame unlike the IKEA base which moves around when u sit on the bed (annoying). Over all it's just ok product. I am not sad or happy with my purchase. Seems A little expensive after seeing the materials used.
customer_reviews.author: BTG

customer_reviews.title: A little expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bed and it looks great. Included some extra assembly parts just in case so that was nice. My only issue is the "leather" on one of the sides to the bed was yellowed a but. I didn't return it because let's face it that is a chore for something so big. You don't even notice it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Just one word: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The most strong and beautiful bed platform I've ever assembled. I bought 3-4 beds from IKEA brand to the present day. I had no problems with the IKEA brand. but for the first time, I decided on another brand and I was very happy. you won't regret it. Pros: Have excellent quality Easy explained Cons: The package of screws is faulty. You cannot see the numbers after the package is opened. there should be numbers on the small packages.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN ERTAN

customer_reviews.title: After a year, 2 drawers are already broken
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with my purchase at first. This bed is beautiful and somewhat sturdy. However, after a year, 2 of the drawers are broken where the hook locks with the bed to keep it from moving. The hook has gotten lost inside the bed frame which is hollow in the locking area. Also, one of the wooden sticks that are part of the bed's foundation has also broken. I cannot sit on the right corner of my bed because it doesn't have a stick to support the mattress. My mattress sinks down if it sit on the corner. Overall beautiful, but not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Grecia R

customer_reviews.title: Great bed. Looks nice. Very sturdy. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my teenaged daughter. She loves it. Packed well and arrived in perfect condition. Very sturdy, very easy to assemble. Easy to follow instructions. I’d say assembling the drawers was the most tedious part. TIP: I paired it with a Simmons memory foam mattress from my local Costco primarily because of the ease of hauling it home, it comes vacuum sealed in a compact box that will fit in the back seat of most cars.
customer_reviews.author: The Critic

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!!! I love this look. I wish it was easier to clean because my son took a blue pen to it that won't come off. Im a 25 (then 24) year old female and I put this together all on my own fairly quickly. Now that I have used it for some months I notice a rocking in the headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about the cost and aesthetics of the bed. The bed arrived on a Tuesday after it was originally supposed to arrive on a Friday and then pushed again to Sunday. The original box was ripped around 3/4 of the corners. It was visibly open and the cardboard of the box was moist from water exposure. I was panicking when I saw that. It appeared that the inside contents were dry (thankfully) however, upon assembling we noticed some damage to the bed which can be viewed in the pictures included. We are upset that the damage is so noticeable, especially since it’s on one of the drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle La Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Good Bed
customer_reviews.text: So far this bed has been great! It wasn’t hard to assemble but it did take two people and about an hour. I absolutely love the Drawers because I Can store sheets right under the bed. It’s been very sturdy and with my boyfriend and I it’s been able to hold over 400lbs with no problem. I like the leather and I like the color. It does not look cheap and it’s not easily scratched.
customer_reviews.author: THEAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Sleepless in Seattle
customer_reviews.text: I still cant sleep. I had hoped this bedframe would increase my Zzzzzzz's, I said sipping redbull at 2 am. But on the up side my wife sleeps longer so it definitely increased the peace! Worth every "Canadian one-month piece ".
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Compton

customer_reviews.title: Cute pleather bed with lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, yet time consuming with the included tool. If I had access to my husband’s drill, I probably would have been a rebel and saved several hours of my life. The drawers are not attached, so they are able to be rolled anywhere. There are “buttons” to hold them in place, but probably not really necessary. One has already come off and I’m debating whether or not to put it back. If I were to go back in time after having the bed for a month, I would definitely buy it again. I have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Lots of good reviews for a reason...great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging, and took pictures while unboxing. Impressive actually. The instructions are excellent...anyone can assemble this bed. I used an Allen wrench bit (5/32 size), and drill, and installed all the Allen bolts this way. Forget doing this by hand! A rubber mallet taps the wooden rails into place. Very sturdy finished product. Looks great. Glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Leger

customer_reviews.title: Very steady and great looks
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a month. 2 year old jumps on it. No issues at all. Very steady and heavy build. I would say you can compare this any furniture store bed around $400-$500. Overall look is very pleasing. Material is very good and I don’t think it will go bad soon. Ok to assemble took about 3 hours. Instructions are good and clear
customer_reviews.author: Supreet N.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but mattress fits weird even getting the correct size
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, easy to assemble, don’t be scared by the thin slats because I have the same on my bed and i’ve been with mine for about 4 yrs now. The only thing I did not like about this bed is the fact that the mattress stays right on top, it is not like it will drop into the square frame so even getting the correct mattress size (full) it is still looking weird and like it does not fit well. Mattress moves if you lean against it since it is just sitting on top, but that’s just if you move it.
customer_reviews.author: Flaca

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: I love this platform bed!! It was easy to assemble came with extra parts just in case you brake something (like I did). Very Sturdy and I love the extra space underneath for storage. Would only ask of manufacturer to better package product, mine came damaged from shipper due to cardboard being thin and not thick enough to handle fork lift.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Great product dont believe the bad reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been holding off on writing a review due to the other reviews saying the frame collapsed so I used a bedframe for the first night however the next day decided to take it off and its been great. Super comfy. Took me about 2 hours to build but I also made dinner in that time. As mentioned in other reviews the drawers are plastic but theyre really sturdy however are blocked by nightstands.
customer_reviews.author: Cutter

customer_reviews.title: Order from here not from Wally World
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this same frame through Walmart and it came broken which we returned and then ordered the replacement here. The order came quickly and was not damaged. The bed was easy to put together and looks nice and sleek. I am happy with the design and price. I do wish the headboard was a bit taller but it’s not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This bed fame is awesome! the storage the drawers provide is unbeatable, but the bed is put together by two hands and Allen wrench... it took me many hours to get it all together!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible experience
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed and I love it but unfortunately their was missing pieces. I called the manufacturer and they weren't compassionate at all. They said they’ll only give me $10 because of the issue and now I have to wait even longer for the missing pieces to come in. On top of that amazon is only giving $60. I am so upset tonight I won’t be sleeping on a bed after waiting weeks for this one to come in and I was so excited. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Ballos

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy bed!
customer_reviews.text: We love the bed, it is very sturdy and the material is high quality. One thing we noticed is that the bed is an inch or more wider than a standard Twin mattress, meaning you can see the wooding springs on the side. Doesn't matter much for us, we moved the bed on a wall and added a rolled blanket between wall and bed anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Manddun

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Cute, great storage, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed! It’s so cute! And the storage draws are great for kids’ toys or stuffed animals. My boyfriend said it wasn’t too bad to put together. The white pleather really lights up the whole room! Totally reasonable price. No regrets AT ALL on this purchase! (Probably important to note that we have a Twin XL mattress on the frame right now, so it does hang over the end of it a bit. If you have a normal Twin mattress, it would fit fine)
customer_reviews.author: Aubriellea

customer_reviews.title: Very cute. And worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: So worth the price. Very easy to put together. Just keep animals and children away.
customer_reviews.author: Alexanderia

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Packaged well and was easy to put together. The headboard feels nice and soft. The only thing that would have been nicer is more study draws. The bottom of the draws is simply a thick see through plastic. Only suitable for very light weight items. Overall, we're very happy with the bed considering the price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Shui Jing

customer_reviews.title: In love with this bed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautIful bed. I read most reviews before purchasing it and I was little skeptical of buying it. I am glad I took a leap of faith and bought it. The board and side panels faux are good quality. The drawers are big enough. Yes they are wobbly but they open and close perfectly. I am in love with this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: The product is of very low quality. Multiple pieces broke while trying to put together. Some of the pieces didn’t line up correctly , which made it even harder to assemble. One side of the head board is pretty loose. And the wood slots that hold up the mattress are very thin and 2 broke while installing.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice bed delicate and easy to build
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice bed delicate and easy to build, the materials are well packed and the manual is easy to understand, my daughters love it is a way to be in fashion with a very low price, totally recommended. I bougt 2 and just took 40 min to build.
customer_reviews.author: Norellys

customer_reviews.title: Great bed! Sturdy and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: My 13-year-old daughter and I had this thing put together for her room in under an hour. I was singularly impressed how this was packed. You'll have to see it to understand what I mean on that. This isn't cheap material which was something I was concerned about. Good and sturdy. HEAVY box so be ready with a helper. Quality faux leather. No box spring needed. Great bed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: dont get side dressers or you cant use half of the drawers
customer_reviews.text: husband said it was hard to put together and he broke a part of the bed. also the drawers are weird to close. you cant just slide it in. you have to lift it so it clips in. we got side drawers to and didnt think about it but it made 2 dawars hard to get to so we cant use it for every day items. but it is beautiful and has been sturdy the last month we had it so I am giving it 4 stars for that
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Avoid. Go with a cheaper option.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but that's about it. Bought this last year. Takes forever to assemble. The wooden slats have way too much give to them. Many will break or splinter randomly without even putting abnormal amount of weight on a particular area. It only has two thin bars down the center for middle support to the floor. Both cheaply welded and broke off over time. Needed to support weight down the middle with plywood and other items. Last week I bought the Best Seller Zinus, which takes (legit) like 3 minutes to set up. I actually kept this headboard though and slid it behind my new frame just to make it look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gary G.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Overall a beautiful bed. A little difficult to put together simply because of the drawers. That’s to be expected. The one thing she doesn’t like is that you have to clip the drawers shut. Other than that it’s a total win for us! UPDATE!!! It literally fell apart in less than 6 months. Definitely would not recommend. My kids only spend 1/2 their time here. It’s really disappointing that a bed used so little. The drawers never stay shut already the little clips quit working. Purchasing a new bed today. Less than one year later. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: I think it should sell for $200.
customer_reviews.text: I received the bed frame today. I spent a lot of time to assemble it. I found many problems. First, his middle support has two screws in front of it. Second, many leather connection places are cheap and simple. The third drawer is too cheap. It’s a plastic film. I think it should sell for $200.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Bed and easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: We made a project out of it and it was fun... however, we were all excited to use my new drill! we didn't get to... with the 100+ screws it came with, it only came with one little hex wrench... It all worked out fine and looks beautiful... The slats take some time to put together but all parts were there and nothing was missing...
customer_reviews.author: lattelover34

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great bed frame. Looks wonderful! It is a little low, just at my knees with a 12" memory foam mattress. So I don't know that it would be good for an elderly person who has a hard time standing from a low position. but is absolutely perfect for an average adult or my teenage daughter. It's been slept on for several months now and is holding up great no problems at all
customer_reviews.author: SMcD

customer_reviews.title: Great bed but WOW.. it STINKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the twin size in white for my toddler and it's great but wow... it's been several days and the chemical smell of the faux leather is awful. We cannot get rid of it no matter what we try. It also came with a couple scuffs in the leather when delivered but nothing too bad. Overall, we love the bed but the smell is KILLING us... such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: Worst money spend ever! It’s hard to put together, the slats are almost impossible to put in, if you do put them in, they’ll keep falling and because of the mechanism it has. It’s just not possible to put it again. The pole that is in the middle is like unstable so the bed makes so much noise and it’s like leaning to one side. Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Camila Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: Missing multiple pieces upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I like this bed frame, it looks nice and is sturdy. However, for the price I would have liked it if I didnt have to contact customer service multiple times. First, the set did NOT come with instructions... I had to call and get them sent to me via email before we could even start the construction. We were about done (putting together the drawers) when we realised that we were missing the peice "s" which is four whole pieces of the drawers. Needless to say we were not able to finish the bed that day. Idk about you, but if I had known that it would have been such a hassle, I would've bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Bed looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what to expect ordering furniture online, but this bed met every expectation. Even has padded boards for the back side of the bed that usually sits against the wall. This extra detail shows that they did not try and cut costs. I would recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and fairly easy to put together considering i did it myself
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as pictured. Quick delivery and fairly easy to put together considering i did it myself. Very sturdy and no moving or noises. Looks really good for the price Update- 9 months of use and one of the support legs snapped off :-(. Sags very badly in the middle now
customer_reviews.author: jodiw

customer_reviews.title: Collapsed
customer_reviews.text: Well I loved this bed for couple of months until it collapsed under me! The support in the middle just broke off! And I am not a big girl, 125 lbs and my 100 lbs dog was sleeping next to me....i didnt expect it to only support toddler weight...very upset right now
customer_reviews.author: CorsoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit smaller in height as I thought but that’s my fault for not measuring. I think it looks amazing for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Solid build with a not-so-solid drawer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sturdy product built with steel frames and easy to install hardware. Took about 3-4 hours to assemble (2 of us) but was surprised to find the build of the drawer. They were made with plastic and the way it sits on the bed frame isn't super cool..if you are looking for a solid bed but not worried too much about a sturdy drawer - this is surely going to help. Please note that we were still able to place a couple of comforters in our draw - but if you ask me whether it can be used for everyday use - I would probably say No..
customer_reviews.author: Radhika

customer_reviews.title: Probably My Most Favorite Thing About My Room
customer_reviews.text: Putting this thing together was super fun and came out looking extremely nice and super sturdy. The drawers are large and hold quite a bit, and the frame was exactly the right size for my full-size Puffy Lux mattress. It's sexy as hell and I love it to pieces. I even got a Blanket with diamond stitching and a chair to match. In fact this bed frame has pretty much governed my room's decor.
customer_reviews.author: Crane6

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, the material. I don't like that it's so close to the ground, apparently I didn't read the dimensions..... the boards that hold the mattress seem like they are not going to last very long... my husband will have to install some better quality ones. The head board is not tall, with the covers and pillows it covers most of the head board.... again, I didn't read the dimensions! Other than that it's a beautiful bed, specially for a teenage girl. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee R.

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy and beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: It only took my husband an hour and a half to get it together-seated both our box spring and mattress on it and no problems! It is very sturdy and beautifully made. It has improved our sleep tremendously! Better than our plain old metal frame. Our mattress and boxspring were new but already started to get the dreaded butt rutt! After placing our set on this frame its like they are brand new again! Do not be afraid,this is actually a great buy!<3 Especially for the value<3
customer_reviews.author: Paying customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This bed is awful. Within the first 3 days I slept on the bed I’ve woke up in the middle of the night and the slats were broken. Description says it can hold up to 500 lbs. I’m less than half of that, I’m scared to have another person sleep in bed with me, as I have fixed the slats temporarily. Sits super low to the ground. It’s a very pretty platform bed frame if you aren’t going to sleep on it. I contacted Dorel Home Furnishings over a week ago and have not heard anything back so now I am here. 1/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase zinus brand over this.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a zinus diamond upholstered at the same time as this. This took 3x as long to put together. The finished product looks fine but the zinus had far better functionality and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Chaillou

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged product at full price
customer_reviews.text: Product had a small rip in the footboard on the side. Was advertised as new, so I bought it at full price. The packaging came damaged as well. There was another one advertised at a lower price with damaged packaging. I think I got ripped off. However, the product has held up really well and I am overall happy with the storage drawers and look of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Queen Size, AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing. The built in "box spring" makes it feel like we got a brand new mattress as well. The assembly took about 5 hrs but that was with interruptions from a 2 year old and a newborn. My husband and I enjoyed the time we spend putting it together though. Instructions are super easy to follow. The 4 drawers are extremely spacious. We considered this bed our Christmas gift to each other and we absolutely LOVE it! Great purchase and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline L.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Parts were easy to assemble up until it was time to sleep. I could feel the woods from the bed against my ribs so I put cardboard underneath the mattress to not feel the woods. It hurts! Towards the head is tilted down so I place small woods on both sides to level up the bedto avoid getting my blood into my head while sleeping. My husband and I spent 400 dollars for a bed that is uncomfortable and cant return.
customer_reviews.author: christelle kouao

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and solid bed.
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't as easy to put together as I had hoped. Also, the black material that goes on the back of the headboard (that I thought was shipping material) - and promptly tossed - was not listed on the supply list. Oops! In the end, a very pretty bed that is low to the floor; this is a good thing so my daughter cannot put everything under her bed when she "cleans" her room.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $400
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughter saw this bed and she had to have it so I got it for her, She and her sister put it together in 1 hour "relatively easy" they put it However after one mount of sleeping on it the boards in the bottom broke and they kept breaking. She claims it's fine but she has mentioned wanting a new bed. So if the bed was cheaper maybe I'd have a better rating but I'm fairly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Campbell

customer_reviews.title: I have a small room and this fits my dimensions ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a small room and this fits my dimensions perfectly. It's adds a sophistication to any space. The headboard is comfy to rest your head against and you can have the bed pressed right up against the wall covering an outlet because there is space behind the headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: I seen a few reviews about this bed being not so sturdy, i bought it anyway... because of the drawers i didn't want a dresser and let me tell you these drawers are huge! I purchased a queen size and all my and my husband items fit in 2 drawers i also seen people commenting about the boards breaking that supported the mattress i don't see how that could be possible if assembled correctly, myself and my husband combined weight is around 480 so i can say this bed will hold one happy customer here.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Partain

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl birthday present was mommy remodeling her room to a big girl room for her 6th birthday. Love everything about the bed! I've window shopped for 5 months and finally came across this. Out of all furniture stores and online shopping I knew this was the one! My main goals were something that will last, platform so I wouldn't need a box spring, elegant and this has all. The spacious 4 drawers under the bed are absolute space savers. No need for dresser now. Also a plus!!! Thank you Amazon for another great buy! Comforter set and curtains also from Amazon. Everything was affordable and great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product a 4-star because as i was putting together the bed (really easy to do) i noticed that the plastic pieces that hold together the spring wood boards on each end are fairly easy to bend/break. Also, you have to be careful when you're putting together the drawers, it's too easy to put them together backwards. I ended up having to re-assemble 3 of the 4 drawers over again. Other than that the overall product is great, the quality is great and i would recommend purchasing the product.
customer_reviews.author: Daneah

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was a little involved and time consuming to assemble. The drawers seem a little flimsy probably because very light. Proof is if they hold up; we'll see. Other than that, it looks good and functions well. I put 10" gel mattress on it and seems ok.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy and seamless
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy and seamless, all necessary hardware was included. The design is however less than ideal for thick/deep mattresses of 19-innches or more. The mattress-set which I intended to use left just 6-inches of headboard because they were so high.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I got this in a full size, white for my daughters small room. I was worried it may take up too much space but it didnt. Very sleek, classy look. Extremely easy to assemble and the design is nice and sturdy. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

product_meta.title: DHP Dakota Upholstered Platform Bed with Storage Drawers, Black Faux Leather, Full
product_meta.description: Color:Black Faux Leather| Size:Full| Style:Bed with Storage DrawersGive yourself the bed you deserve! the Dakota upholstered bed with storage drawers ticks off all the elements for a perfect bed – style, comfort and functionality. This contemporary and chic bed frame is designed with graceful button tufted diamond patterns on both the headboard and footboard and upholstered in faux leather. The frame is made with sturdy wood and includes a sturdy wooden slats system, a center Rail and supporting side rails that allow you to sleep blissfully on your favorite mattress without the slightest worry. The goodness doesn’t stop there, the Dakota also comes with under bed built in storage drawers which provide you the clever extra storage for bedding sets, out-of-season clothing, books, shoes and more. Enjoy a wonderful doze of cozy and comfort with this understated elegant and well-crafted bed!
feature_bullets: STYLISH BED FRAME | Contemporary and chic bed frame with button-tufted diamond detailing.
STURDY STRUCTURE | Includes metal side rails, center metal rail and additional metal legs for maximum stability and support.
AIR CIRCULATION | Wooden slat system ensures right amount of support and air circulation, essential for a good night’s rest.
SPACE-SAVING FUNCTIONALITY | Contains four built-in drawers perfect for small-space living and additional storage.
EASY HANDLING | All components concealed in headboard. Available in multiple colors and sizes.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,227 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
